title: SIGILL: illegal instruction
body:
HI All

Trying to follow the guide but can't start beacon-chain for some reason.  This is running in a proxmox 6.2-11 container.  CPU is E5-2680-v2.  GETH is running with syncmode=fast and --http option is on.  Please help.

```
root@eth:~/prysm# ./prysm.sh beacon-chain --http-web3provider=http://localhost:8545
Latest Prysm version is v1.2.0.
Beacon chain is up to date.
Verifying binary integrity.

gpg: Good signature from "Preston Van Loon <preston@prysmaticlabs.com>" [unknown]
gpg: WARNING: This key is not certified with a trusted signature!
gpg:          There is no indication that the signature belongs to the owner.
```

Thanks for the report! I've filed one just before you, so let's consolidate into one issue.

Duplicate of #8410
